intro: Nastus schmutzii, commonly known as the Schmutzii nasturtium, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Brassicaceae family, which includes other well-known plants like mustard and cabbage. The plant features bright yellow flowers that are typically borne on erect stems. Its leaves are alternate and have a slightly hairy texture. Nastus schmutzii is often cultivated for its ornamental value and can also be used in some traditional medicinal practices.
